name: Bomb-Bomb Ron
description:
Bomb-Bomb Ron is a 2D action platformer, where you jump on little green dude's heads and blow them up. Developed by one man-child, Jake Benbow, in the space of three weeks, it's a short, sweet and simple game, but I like to think it's pretty fun. As it stands, the game is complete, however if people seem to enjoy it then I could always revisit it.

I hope you enjoy playing, please let me know what you think on Twitter (@jakebenbow) and also if you have time to complete a quick feedback form, that'd be awesome! The game is free, but if you really really like the game, then if you could give me a small tip or donation then that'd be greatly appreciated,

Happy bombing!
